name: Frostbites (18+ Version)
description:
Note: This is a proof-of-concept demo for Frostbites, produced during the two month period for Yurijam 2017. We hope to provide you with a full game by the end of the year, featuring a complete story, additional art assets including backgrounds and CGs, and music and sound effects. We hope you enjoy the demo for what it is, and feedback is appreciated!

Note: This version of Frostbites contains occasional descriptions of sexual contact, and while there are no long explict sex scenes written or drawn, some people may not be comfortable with such things. There is another version of the game with these scenes removed available here. Please play the version you are most comfortable with!

You've been gone for a long time. A really long time. And all you have to accompany you as you return to the world you left behind is a stabbing pain in your chest. As memories come flooding back to you, you set off to find the people you left behind, and rekindle old loves — hopefully before winter falls.

In Frostbites you take on the role of the dryad Maylis, who after a horrible disaster she can barely remember finds herself waking from a coma in the middle of a forest, unsure what has happened to her and her partners. Journey through a fantasy world as you experience a story of love, fear, rumination, and resilience as you explore old memories and create new passions.

Created by Kari Avalon (art) and Colleen Potvin (writing), using Renpy 6.99.13.
